Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Flag:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#FlagFHIR R5 Resource `Flag` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Flag`. Element `Flag` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag`.
Flag.meta (meta):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.metaElement `Flag.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.meta`.
Flag.implicitRules (implicitRules):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.implicitRulesElement `Flag.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.implicitRules`.
Flag.language (language):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.languageElement `Flag.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.language`.
Flag.text (text):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.textElement `Flag.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.text`.
Flag.contained (contained):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.containedElement `Flag.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.contained`.
Flag.identifier (identifier):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.identifierElement `Flag.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.identifier`.
Flag.status (status):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.statusElement `Flag.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.status`.
Flag.category (category):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.categoryElement `Flag.category` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.category`.
Flag.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.codeElement `Flag.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.code`.
Flag.subject (subject):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.subjectElement matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.subject`.
Flag.period (period):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.periodElement `Flag.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.period`.
Flag.encounter (encounter):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.encounterElement `Flag.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.encounter`.
Flag.author (author):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag#Flag.authorElement matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.author`.

name: ConceptMapR5FlagElementsForR4Flag
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Flag` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Flag`.
Element `Flag` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag`.
Element `Flag.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.meta`.
Element `Flag.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.implicitRules`.
Element `Flag.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.language`.
Element `Flag.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.text`.
Element `Flag.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.contained`.
Element `Flag.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.identifier`.
Element `Flag.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.status`.
Element `Flag.category` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.category`.
Element `Flag.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.code`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead.
Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `Flag.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.subject`.
Element `Flag.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.period`.
Element `Flag.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.encounter`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead.
Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `Flag.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.author`.
